name: Slider-Style Mini Burgers
author: Minnesota_Girl
summary: These remind me of my favorite fast food restaurant's little burgers! Perfect appetizer to bring to a party!
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cover a baking sheet with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray
Mix together the ground beef and onion soup mix in a large skillet; cook and stir over medium-high heat until the beef is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink
Drain and discard any excess grease
Stir the mayonnaise and Cheddar cheese into the ground beef mixture
Lay the bottoms of the dinner rolls on the prepared baking sheet
Spread the cheese and beef mixture on the bottom half of each roll
Cover with another sheet of aluminum foil sprayed with cooking spray
Bake in the preheated oven until the burgers are heated through and cheese melts, about 30 minutes
